about_the_game:
Unlocks the option to change the in-game soundtrack to the original soundtrack and sound effects from the original 1998 release of Resident Evil 2.

*This can be found in the "Music/SFX Version" section of the Options Menu.
*Please note this is the same content included in the Extra DLC Pack.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
